headline: Trial will determine who will pay $600 million settlement in disastrous Norfolk Southern derailment
summary: Norfolk Southern wants two other companies to help pay for the $600 million class-action settlement it agreed to over its disastrous 2023 train derailment near the Ohio-Pennsylvania border and the...
